page.title: 15TRADE
page.content:
Delamere/Eddisbury {TRADE Shops There are two shops, the Forest cafe & Gift shop at Hatchmere,& Delamere Post Office & general store.Both are on the eastern edge of the forest,the cafe to the north & the post office to the south.Both are open on Sundays,the cafe staying open quite late for visitors.
Restaurants. There are two restaurants also,the Tudor Restaurant which is nearly opposite the Forest Cafe at Hatchmere, & the Woodfield Hotel(a guesthouse too).Both these establishments are well known in the area & are popular.
